#summary A summary of the game.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

A simple game to test your wits. Two players take turn putting crosses on a 9-by-9 board. Whoever make connections to three, six, or nine crosses scores those points. Obviously The player with the higher score wins. See project3_6_9 for the history of the project.

= Instructions =

Get to the menu bar to start a new one-player or two-player game. Players take turns. Double tap a square to mark it and begin playing. Make rows, columns, or diagonals of exactly 3, 6, or 9 to score. Highest score wins.
